meanings.definition: The act of performing official duties or functions.
meanings.sent1: During the officiations, the mayor handed out awards to the winners.
meanings.sent2: The officiations at the courthouse were conducted with great precision.
meanings.sent3: The officiations at the school assembly made the students feel important.
meanings.sent4: Her officiations as a judge were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The officiations of the ceremony left a lasting impression on the attendees.

meanings.definition: The process of conducting a ceremony or event in an official capacity.
meanings.sent1: The officiations for the wedding were beautifully organized.
meanings.sent2: She was in charge of the officiations at the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The officiations for the pet show were surprisingly formal.
meanings.sent4: The officiations of the event felt like a grand performance.
meanings.sent5: His officiations as the master of ceremonies were flawless.
